channel.title: History of Post-Apocalyptic RPGs (Pt 21: 2017)
channel.description:
![PA Banner|690x315](upload://4Buv25vZM9ZweoC2Fmz0s9p555P.jpeg) On The Gauntlet Blog I present the 21st installment in my look at rpgs set in the aftermath of disasters (near and in the distant past). You see tons of settings: fantasy, modern, sci-fi. This one goes from Altais to Umerica.
**You can see that here:** https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/history-of-post-apocalyptic-rpgs-part-21-2017
It has links to all the previous installments as well as series covering Superhero, Steampunk/Victoriana, Horror, Cyberpunk, Universal Systems, Licensed Games, and more.
